@BenM_Anderson @EnvAgency @PHE_uk  got involved with another landfill site and helped produce a survey of the health impact of local residents. #wheresoursurvey ? They had nowhere near the level of complaints either 🤨🤔

entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text:
Why aren’t you protecting our vulnerable pregnant ladies @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency ? 
Act now before things get worse!  @benarowley @eddiehallWSM @robbiewilliams @CharlotteSalt_ @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/6mg2fdC8Bb

@Cap_it_off @RachSalv @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 My 5 year old who suffers from  Asthma woke this morning and told me he couldn't breathe. The fact @daera_ni  & @EnvAgency are not taking action against these sites & @publichealthni & @PublicHealth have deemed the gas leaks as not harmful to public health is a national scandal

Now whatever is happening with all of that I wonder?

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/BLurpe51O2

A barren spring on the River Lugg canal. Other picture is the #riverlugg on the other side of Kingsland bridge. Are you still there @EnvAgency  @DaveThroupEA @NaturalEngland ?? https://t.co/Yu6A3Cio1w

tweets.text: More fishermen spotted yesterday! Persistent illegally angling indicates the need for an urgent action plan for enforcement and maintenance of the Welsh Harp (Brent Reservoir)⚠️ @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @Brent_Council @BarnetCouncil Please do something. https://t.co/baxUO02Pmr

Chair of the @EnvAgency @EmmaHowardBoyd discusses the #FCERM strategy in this  blog: https://t.co/ztI8b9KUvg 

#climatechange #flooding #erosion https://t.co/u2OOMMdY8D

urls.title: FCRM strategy op-ed - Emma Howard Boyd, Chair of the Environment Agency
urls.description: An op-ed from Emma Howard-Boyd on our FCRM strategy

tweets.text:
Chair of the @EnvAgency @EmmaHowardBoyd discusses the #FCERM strategy in this  blog: https://t.co/ztI8b9KUvg 

#climatechange #flooding #erosion https://t.co/u2OOMMdY8D

Excellent start-up for the brand new #DollisBrookers #RiverAction Group! 
This wonderful brook & the Dollis #GreenValley walk has great potential to transform & thrive 
Although many problems now #LocalAction can & will lead to #LastingChange @ThamesWater @Thames21 @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/KMlcStvNO8

Over the next 6 years, £5.2bn will be invested in #FCERM, but it is estimated that if we are to avoid #floodrisk getting worse we will need to invest £1bn 💷 every year for the next 50 years! 

Take a look at @EnvAgency's coastal management strategy here: https://t.co/Z7XBtEnLJo https://t.co/gSwE49fXHe

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text: Imagine working all day in PPE then taking it off and breathing in the faeces fumes giving you a sore throat and bad chest. Enough is enough @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @benarowley @eddiehallWSM @robbiewilliams @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/CnC7Wg7P0U

@aireriverstrust @ProfJGrey @WildTroutTrust @AireCatchment @EnvAgencyYNE @PeteTurnerEA @SandTCUKYorks @fishmigration @IslanderDodd Think some anglers have recorded grayling from lower reaches of the Worth. @philsheridan888 @Spider_fishing might know upstream limit?

@Steeveeh @Sarahemma100xxx @dpcarrington @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids fail to regulate... Are they negligent? It’s the most complained about Landfill site in the country nearly 6,000 complaints about Walleys Landfill in March 21! How many in April? People’s Health is suffering, they’re gassed in their own homes. It’s at crisis point.

@Sarahemma100xxx @dpcarrington @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Hi @dpcarrington my son woke me up at 4am complaining of the smell in his bedroom, it was horrendous until a couple of hours ago. @EnvAgency are to scared of @RedIndustries2 to do anything about it. Can you help?
They’re not listening ! @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/rt1xTLkBBs

@BradfordCityAA @aireriverstrust @ProfJGrey @WildTroutTrust @AireCatchment @EnvAgencyYNE @PeteTurnerEA @SandTCUKYorks @fishmigration @IslanderDodd @philsheridan888 @discovertaichi. Hi Phil. Have you caught any grayling on the Worth.
